events.message: The candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Software Engineer position, showcasing extensive experience in backend development.
The application was reviewed and categorized under Engineering due to the candidate's software development background and relevant skills.
Recruiter Jane Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's candidacy for the software engineer role to ensure smooth communication.
Initial screening call with John Doe was conducted successfully, confirming his experience with Python, Java, and cloud services.
John Doe responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for proceeding to the technical interview stage of the hiring process.
A technical interview with the engineering team was scheduled for John Doe on May 7th at 10 AM to assess coding and system design skills.
